biotools.summary: Implements an enhanced version of the TextQuest algorithm, providing a user friendly web-based interface. BTQ collects abstracts from Medline literature and OMIM databases matching a user query. Identification of relevant terms enables the representation of text records in a Vector Space Model and the calculation of pairwise document similarities. Employing suitable clustering algorithms, results are transformed into clusters of records along with their corresponding terms.

bioschemas.name: BioTextQuest+
